TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void Action<in T1,in T2,in T3,in T4,in T5,in T6,in T7,in T8>(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4, T5 arg5, T6 arg6, T7 arg7, T8 arg8);
.class public auto ansi sealed Action`8<- T1, - T2, - T3, - T4, - T5, - T6, - T7, - T8> extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub Action(Of In T1, In T2, In T3, In T4, In T5, In T6, In T7, In T8)(arg1 As T1, arg2 As T2, arg3 As T3, arg4 As T4, arg5 As T5, arg6 As T6, arg7 As T7, arg8 As T8)

generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5, typename T6, typename T7, typename T8> public delegate void Action(T1 arg1, T2 arg2, T3 arg3, T4 arg4, T5 arg5, T6 arg6, T7 arg7, T8 arg8);

summary.span: 封装一个方法，该方法具有八个参数且不返回值。

span.span: Encapsulates a method that has eight parameters and does not return a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用 委托以参数形式传递方法，而无需显式声明自定义委托。You can use the delegate to pass a method as a parameter without explicitly declaring a custom delegate. 封装的方法必须对应于由此委托定义的方法签名。The encapsulated method must correspond to the method signature that is defined by this delegate. 这意味着封装的方法必须具有八个通过值传递给它的参数，并且不能返回值。This means that the encapsulated method must have eight parameters that are all passed to it by value, and it must not return a value. （在 c # 中，方法必须返回 `void` 。(In C#, the method must return `void`. 在 Visual Basic 中，它必须由 `Sub` .。。`End Sub`In Visual Basic, it must be defined by the `Sub`…`End Sub` construct。construct. 它也可以是返回忽略的值的方法。）通常，这种方法用于执行操作。It can also be a method that returns a value that is ignored.) Typically, such a method is used to perform an operation. > [!NOTE] > 若要引用具有八个参数并返回值的方法，请改用泛型 委托。To reference a method that has eight parameters and returns a value, use the generic delegate instead. 还可以将 委托与匿名方法和 lambda 表达式一起使用。You can also use the delegate with anonymous methods and lambda expressions.
